statements: SELECT * FROM sales_data ORDER BY sale_date DESC
SELECT product_name, sale_amount FROM sales_data WHERE sale_amount > 1000
SELECT sale_id, product_name, sale_date, sale_amount FROM sales_data WHERE sale_id IN (1, 2, 3)
SELECT * FROM sales_data WHERE product_name LIKE 'S%'
SELECT sale_date, product_name FROM sales_data ORDER BY sale_amount ASC
SELECT * FROM sales_data WHERE sale_amount > 1000 ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, sale_amount FROM sales_data WHERE sale_date >= '2022-01-01' AND sale_date <= '2022-12-31' ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT sale_id, product_name, sale_amount FROM sales_data WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY sale_amount DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT product_name FROM sales_data WHERE sale_amount < 5000 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT MAX(sale_amount), MIN(sale_amount) FROM sales_data WHERE sale_date = '2023-01-15';
SELECT * FROM Sales WHERE sale_amount > 1000
SELECT sale_amount, sale_date FROM Sales WHERE product_id = 3
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM Products WHERE unit_price < 50
SELECT product_name, product_category FROM Products WHERE product_category = 'Electronics'
SELECT * FROM Sales ORDER BY sale_date DESC
SELECT * FROM Sales WHERE sale_amount > 1000 ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, product_category, unit_price FROM Products WHERE unit_price < 50 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT sales_id, sale_date, sale_amount FROM Sales WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY sale_amount DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, product_category, unit_price FROM Products WHERE product_category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY unit_price ASC;
SELECT sales_id, product_id, sale_amount FROM Sales WHERE sale_amount < 5000 ORDER BY product_id ASC,sale_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM sales
SELECT product_name, sale_amount FROM sales
SELECT product_name, sale_date FROM sales WHERE sale_amount > 1000
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT report_id, report_date, total_revenue FROM sales_report WHERE total_revenue < 5000
SELECT product_name, sale_date, sale_amount FROM sales WHERE sale_amount > 1000 ORDER BY sale_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics'
SELECT s.product_name, s.sale_date, p.price FROM sales s JOIN products p ON s.product_name = p.product_name
SELECT sr.report_id, sr.report_date, sr.total_revenue FROM sales_report sr WHERE total_revenue > 5000
SELECT s.product_name, s.sale_amount, pr.total_revenue FROM sales s JOIN sales_report pr ON s.sale_date = pr.report_date
SELECT * FROM sales_data;
SELECT DISTINCT product_name, sale_date FROM sales_data WHERE sale_amount > 1000 ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 5;
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM products WHERE unit_price < 50 ORDER BY unit_price ASC;
SELECT sale_id, product_id, customer_id, sale_date, sale_quantity FROM sales WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT product_name, sale_amount FROM sales_data WHERE sale_amount > 1000 ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 5;
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM products WHERE unit_price < 50 ORDER BY product_name;
SELECT sale_id, product_id, customer_id FROM sales WHERE sale_quantity BETWEEN 5 AND 10 ORDER BY sale_id;
SELECT sale_date, SUM(sale_amount) AS total_sales FROM sales_data GROUP BY sale_date HAVING total_sales > 5000 ORDER BY total_sales DESC;
SELECT * FROM sales;
SELECT product_name, quantity, price FROM sales WHERE sale_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE price > 100.00;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(order_id) AS total_orders FROM orders GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM sales ORDER BY sale_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT product_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM sales GROUP BY product_name
SELECT customer_name, orders.order_id, products.product_name FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id JOIN products ON orders.product_id = products.product_id
SELECT category_name, AVG(price) AS avg_price FROM products JOIN categories ON products.category = categories.category_name GROUP BY category_name
SELECT * FROM products WHERE price > 50 AND category = 'Electronics' LIMIT 10
